review_data.title: Elevated neighborhood charm!
review_data.content: In Zurich for only one night, we found Kantorei and were delighted at the entire experience! The neighborhood is old with narrow, cobblestone streets too narrow for cars and lined with exquisite shops and galleries! The restaurant is small, warm and very comfortable. When we...More

review_data.title: Mittagessen sehr zu empfehlen
review_data.content: Preiswert und trotzdem hochwertig. Sehr zufrieden. Kinderfreundlich. aussergewöhnliche Speisen, aber trotzdem traditionell

review_data.title: Great food and friendly service!
review_data.content: My favorite dining spot in Zurich! I've eaten here multiple times and received high-quality service and food each time! Delicious food and very friendly service! ❤

review_data.title: Wie immer hervorragend!!!

review_data.title: Delicious Sunday Brunch

review_data.title: Good typical Zurich restaurant

review_data.title: gute bedienung, gutes essen

review_data.title: Swiss cuisine at its best
review_data.content: Top class Swiss cuisine at this bubbly and chic restaurant in Zurich’s old town. House specialties include the famous Zurich sliced veal in mushroom sauce and of course schnitzel. Great wine selection also - try the local Swiss varieties- they do not get exported but...More

review_data.title: Nice brunch location

review_data.title: Very good experience
review_data.content: Followed a recommendation and was not disappointed. The restaurant is located in a quiet street with a pleasant environment. The food was very good and the service was great. It is not cheap but you do get very good value. Will definitely return.

review_data.content: Thus is a perfect choice for a tasty lunch in Old Town, on picturesque Neumarkt, smoke seating inside and outside, nice seasonal menu. The Bärlauch Risotto (wild garlic) was delicious, served with love, the service impeccable.

review_data.title: Lovely square

review_data.content: We went here on a Rick Steves suggestion, but the food was quite disappointing. Perhaps they were starting in a new chef, because nearly everything on the table was not properly cooked. The vegetable curry had raw, hard garbanzo beans. The spareribs were of poor...More
